frameDefinitions: In this frame, there is a Part of a Whole in which the Part is defined with respect to the canonical or inherent orientation of the Whole.
An Agent pauses in the course of an Activity. '' 'The government froze settlement construction in 1992 to facilitate peace talks.'
The words in this frame refer to facial Expressions and the Possessors of those Expressions.
A Cook applies heat to Food, where the Temperature_setting of the heat and Duration of application may be specified.
This frame covers words for Body_part(s) (BP) belonging to a Possessor (Poss), which may be characterized by a Descriptor (Desc).
This frame is  concerned with the percepts that vibrations which travel through the air or another medium produce in hearing organs.
frameExamples: The government <t>froze</t> settlement construction in 1992 to facilitate peace talks.
He had to brace his right <t><fex name='Body_part'>arm</fex></t> against his leg in order to fight the roll.
I awoke to the <t>clash</t> of a jackhammer on concrete.
listRoleDefinitions: A piece of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>.
An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> is pausing.
An <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which an <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where an <fen>Agent</fen> pauses in the course of an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This is the <fen>Expression</fen> made.
This is the person who exhibitis the <fen>Expression</fen>.
The emotion that is conveyed by a particular <fen>Expression</fen>.
The <fen>Cook</fen> applies heat to the <fen>Food</fen>.
This role identifes the entity that  directly supplies heat to the <fen>Food</fen>.
<fen>Food</fen> is the entity to which heat is applied by the <fen>Cook</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Temperature_setting</fen> of the <fen>Heating_instrument</fen> for the <fen>Food</fen>.
The <fen>Container</fen> holds the <fen>Food</fen> to which heat is applied.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which the heat application occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the heat application  occurs.
This Frame Element denotes the <fen>Possessor</fen> of the <fen>Body_part</fen>.
This Frame Element  is the <fen>Body_part</fen>.
An entity that is construed as a single point source emitting sound.

The location at which sound is produced. This role differs from Location_of_sound_source in that it does not highlight the sound's spreading from its source to the perceiver's location, which is usually indicated by the preposition 'from'.
listRoleExamples: The top <fex>shelf</fex> of the bookcase was lying on the floor.
The show takes place in the West wing <fex>of the White House</fex>.
Jim browned the roast <fex>in the oven</fex>.
He baked the cookies <fex>at 350 degrees</fex> for 11 minutes.
Boil the potatoes <fex>in a medium-sized pan</fex>.
Jim roasted the chestnuts <fex>in the evening</fex>.
We baked the cake <fex>in the kitchen</fex>.
He woke up because of the blare <fex>of a car horn</fex>.
There was a clatter of running feet <fex>in the street outside</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Mater Tzu Chi Research Scholarship
the International Conference on Religious Cooperation
